about.body: Delivering Quality & ROI since 2019. Trusted by leading manufacturers and hospitality, cold-chain, and enterprise operations worldwide.
about.sub_body: We pair ruggedized hardware with operations experts to ensure compliance-ready telemetry from day one.

industry_ready.title: Verify Everything, All The Time
industry_ready.body: Industrial-grade dual-sensor hardware built to ensure data integrity regardless of your environment, from freezers to factory floors.

battery_life.title: 10+ Years On A Single Battery
battery_life.body: Sleep-cycle optimised firmware keeps your data flowing every 10 minutes without surprise downtime. Field replaceable sensor modules extend your ROI even further.

wireless_signal.title: Saves time and money
wireless_signal.body: Let LoRaWAN¬Æ do the heavy lifting with long-range coverage, get readings from anywhere, and cut down on costly commutes for manual checks.

meta.title: CropWatch¬Æ | Industrial IoT That Pays For Itself
meta.description: Rugged industrial IoT for cold chain, manufacturing, and hospitality. Deploy long-range sensors, LoRaWAN gateways, and analytics trusted by operations leaders.

hero.eyebrow: Industrial IoT That Pays For Itself
hero.body_html:
CropWatch¬Æ specializes in building the most trusted industrial IoT systems for cold chain, manufacturing, hospitality, and complex environments. Our dual-sensor hardware, long-life battery design, and LoRaWAN¬Æ connectivity ensure reliable data from even the harshest sites. Combined with our proven deployment methodology and analytics platform, CropWatch¬Æ delivers measurable ROI and time savings to teams large and small.

Before continuing, if you already have a monitoring solution, ask yourself the following questions:
questions: Can your current sensors run for a full decade on a single battery?
What happens if your current sensor fails, or sends you wrong data? Will you know?
Can you change the sensor on your current units? Or do you need to replace the entire device?
Are concrete, steel, and freezers still causing blind spots?
Are manual logs and route checks still burning hours you can't spare?
Can you surface the exact records compliance needs the moment they ask?

manual.title: Manual checks
bullets: Clipboards, spreadsheets, and single daily readings
Averages 20 hrs/week across a 10-site network
Reactive responses when thresholds are breached

automated.title: CropWatch sensors
bullets: Continuous wireless data, automated compliance logs
Checks cut to 2 hrs/week via exception-based workflows
Instant alerts before product loss or safety issues

time_saved.title: Time saved
time_saved.body: Manual logging drops from 20 hrs to just 2 hrs per week, freeing teams for higher-value work.

labor_savings.title: Annual labor savings
labor_savings.body: Based on $25/hour labor, automating temperature logs across 10 sites recoups budget for growth.

productivity.title: Productivity impact
bullets: Audit-ready reports generated automatically‚Äîno more manual data consolidation.
Predictive thresholds catch issues hours earlier, preventing waste and recalls.
Operations teams redeploy hours to training, expansion, and customer care.

battery_life.headline: 10+ year runtime, even in 24/7 facilities
bullets: Send telemetry every 10 minutes without compromising uptime
Field-swappable dual-sensors & cross-validation to reduce downtime
Remote device management to ensure system health

measurement_confidence.headline: ISO17025 alignment, dual sensor cross validation
bullets: Dual-sensor design with tie-breaker logic for each reading
Serialized calibration with cloud-based certificates
Automated drift detection keeps compliance on track
Individual NIST-traceable certificates for each device

connectivity.headline: LoRaWAN¬Æ penetration without blind spots
bullets: Tuned gateways engineered for dense, industrial environments
Buffered storage ensures zero data loss during outages
Private network options when cellular coverage fails

industries.headline: Industries Where Our Sensors Deliver Accurate Measurement and Strong Cost Benefits
industries.intro: Our network is trusted in environments where strict regulations and precise temperature/humidity control are required.

cold_chain.label: Cold Chain
cold_chain.description: Reliable logging even in harsh temperature zones. Protects the quality and compliance of frozen and refrigerated products.

protein.label: Cultural Facilities
protein.description: Preserves artworks and archives in optimal conditions. Ensures stable temperature and humidity in sensitive environments.

hospitality.label: Livestock Industry
hospitality.description: Monitors environments in real time across wide or remote areas, protecting animal health and productivity.

manufacturing.label: Manufacturing & Processing
manufacturing.description: Precise monitoring supports safe production in sites where temperature and humidity directly affect product quality.

storage.label: Storage & Warehousing
storage.description: Visualizes temperature and humidity even in large spaces. Prevents product degradation and audit issues, ensuring safe storage conditions.

agriculture.label: Care Facilities
agriculture.description: Detects sudden temperature/humidity changes early and alerts immediately, supporting quick response to abnormalities.

pricing.headline: Transparent pricing engineered for scale
pricing.intro: Every engagement includes site design, deployment support, and the analytics platform your operators depend on. Pricing flexes with footprint and never penalizes growth.

sensors.title: Sensors & Edge Devices
sensors.lead: Deploy scalable coverage with zero compromise on accuracy.

devices.title: Devices & Gateways
devices.lead: Indoor, outdoor, and carrier-grade LoRaWAN¬Æ options.

software.title: Software & Insights
software.lead: Unified dashboards, unlimited alerts, always-on support.

closing.body: We'll walk your environment, model signal coverage, and produce a business case that leaders can take to the boardroom.

meta.title: Case Studies | CropWatch Industrial IoT Outcomes
meta.description: See how CropWatch delivers measurable ROI for cold storage, hospitality, manufacturing, and agriculture with resilient IoT deployments.

hero.headline: Proof points from demanding environments
intro: Operators rely on CropWatch to deliver resilient networks, trusted analytics, and rapid payback across cold storage, hospitality, and heavy industry.
Explore how we combine hardware, software, and human expertise to meet strict uptime and compliance goals without overwhelming frontline teams.

snapshot.title: Snapshot results
items: 38 percent reduction in spoilage claims for national cold storage network.
22 percent energy savings across a 27 hotel portfolio within the first year.
99.98 percent uptime backed by our global operations centers.

featured.headline: Cross-industry wins delivered with CropWatch
featured.intro: Each engagement pairs ruggedized hardware with rollout specialists who understand regulated environments. The result: measurable efficiency, compliance, and operational clarity.

sunharvest.recap: In the past, TK Ebisu Foods needed to manually monitor the temperature, humidity, and air quality across their coop locations. CropWatch provided a comprehensive IoT solution that automated these processes, ensuring optimal conditions and animal welfare and egg production.

stats.label: By reducing driving time for manual checks, TK Ebisu Foods saved significant labor hours annually.

harborline.recap: This buffet-style restaurant features local cuisine crafted from traditional Miyazaki fruits and vegetables, award-winning Miyazaki beef, rich seafood. CropWatch provides comprehensive IoT food temperature and humidity monitoring solutions to ensure food safety and quality standards are consistently met. Time is saved on manual checks and compliance reporting, allowing staff to focus on enhancing guest experiences.

stats.label: Energy savings measured year over year
Regulatory audits passed on first review

kodiak.recap: Instrumented mission critical production lines to detect vibration, dust, and temperature anomalies.

greenfield.recap: Extended field-to-dock visibility with soil, moisture, and transport telemetry for export partners.

playbook.headline: Consistent outcomes, site after site
playbook.intro: Our structured methodology keeps every engagement focused on measurable ROI and frontline adoption. Customers can scale quickly without compromising quality.

assess.title: Assess
assess.description: We map environments, compliance mandates, and existing telemetry to prioritize critical wins.

pilot.title: Pilot
pilot.description: Joint teams deploy a rapid proof of value with clear KPIs and stakeholder training.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Standardized deployment kits and hybrid field teams extend coverage without disrupting operations.

optimize.title: Optimize
optimize.description: Analytics, playbooks, and quarterly executive reviews keep ROI visible and improvements continuous.

testimony.quote: CropWatch gave us predictive insight into every walk-in and loading bay without drowning our teams in dashboards. The rollout finished ahead of schedule and paid for itself inside the first quarter.
testimony.title: VP of Operations, Harborline Hospitality

closing.headline: Let us map out the first 90 days
closing.body: Share a target facility or pain point and we will deliver a tailored deployment plan, cost model, and timeline within two weeks.

meta.title: Replacement Sensors Coming Soon | CropWatch¬Æ
meta.description: Stay updated as the CropWatch replacement sensor kits approach launch. Explore the benefits, rollout timeline, and how to join the pilot program.

hero.headline: Replacement sensor kit is almost ready
hero.body: We're finalizing hot-swap cartridges that keep your CW Air TH sensors calibrated without shipping hardware back to the factory. Early partners get the tooling, documentation, and support they need on day one.

sidebar.title: What to expect
sidebar.intro: The replacement program is built to keep line operations moving while we handle calibration and recycling.
points: Drop-in cartridges install in minutes with no downtime or rewiring required.
Serialized ISO17025-ready certificates ship inside every kit.
Prepaid envelopes let you return retired probes for responsible recycling.

sensor_suite.title: Keep your fleet mission-ready
sensor_suite.description: Swap sensor cartridges on-site and keep every CW Air TH device reporting without waiting for factory service.

network.title: Stay connected throughout rollout
network.description: Our team pre-configures every module so your LoRaWAN network accepts replacements with zero re-provisioning.

compliance.title: Compliance documentation bundled
compliance.description: Each kit includes calibration proof, chain-of-custody paperwork, and guidance your auditors expect.

discovery.label: Discovery & design
discovery.description: We are finalizing mechanical tolerances, firmware validation, and recycling logistics with early partners.

pilot.label: Pilot deployments
pilot.description: Select fleets will receive pilot kits to validate swap procedures, documentation flow, and support playbooks.

launch.label: General availability
launch.description: Once pilots lock, we will open ordering globally with regional stocking and automated re-ordering.

items.question: Will I need to ship sensors back for calibration?
items.answer: No. Replacement cartridges are factory calibrated and include certificates. You simply swap the probe, scan the code, and log the change in CropWatch Command.

items.question: How much downtime should we budget?
items.answer: Each swap takes under five minutes. Most customers schedule replacements during existing walkthroughs so no additional downtime is required.

items.question: Can we reserve inventory ahead of launch?
items.answer: Yes. Talk to our team and we'll allocate pilot or launch inventory, plus set up automatic replenishment thresholds if needed.

meta.title: LoRaWAN Gateways | CropWatch¬Æ
meta.description: Explore the CropWatch gateway lineup with manufacturer details, indoor and outdoor ratings, and recommended deployments for each model.

hero.headline: Gateways qualified for regulated environments
hero.body: We stock LoRaWAN gateways that survive cold storage, rooftops, and dense industrial interiors. Every unit ships pre-provisioned with the latest firmware so your telemetry network is reliable from day one.

items.title: Pre-provisioned & documented
items.body: Serial numbers, QR codes, and CropWatch Command templates ship inside each crate so install teams can plug in and go.

items.title: Compliance-ready power options
items.body: Support for PoE, LTE backhaul, redundant power, and lightning protection keeps auditors and facilities teams aligned.

items.title: Global operations support
items.body: Our 24/7 operations desk monitors heartbeat telemetry and pushes security updates as new advisories drop.

lineup.headline: From micro indoor multi-floor coverage to larger carrier-grade campus wide coverage
lineup.intro: Choose the right gateway for each facility. Mix indoor, outdoor, and carrier-grade hardware to build resilient LoRaWAN coverage without overspending.

ug65.name: Milesight UG65 Indoor
ug65.summary: High-performance indoor/Covered Outdoor LoRaWAN gateway with Ethernet, Wi-Fi and LTE for quick installs in medium range spaces.
recommended: Cold rooms, livestock and office spaces
Warehouses that need coverage without rooftop access
ug65.image_alt: Milesight UG65 gateway sitting on a workbench

ug67.name: Milesight UG67 Outdoor
ug67.summary: Ruggedized 8-channel gateway with built-in surge protection for rooftops, yards, and remote perimeters.
recommended: Remote locations, Rooftops, and any rough environment exposed to weather
Agriculture or logistics corridors that span kilometers
Facilities needing Wifi, LTE and Ethernet backhaul redundancy
ug67.image_alt: Milesight UG67 gateway mounted on a pole outdoors

kona_micro.name: Tektelic KONA Micro
kona_micro.summary: Compact gateway with a built-in backup battery ideal for indoor coverage where uptime is critical.
recommended: Retail, hospitality suites, or test kitchens
Small offices or network closets needing reliable coverage
Ethernet and LTE backhaul for failover protection
kona_micro.image_alt: Tektelic KONA Micro gateway on a table

kona_enterprise.name: Tektelic KONA Enterprise
kona_enterprise.summary: Enterprise-grade LoRaWAN gateway with dual concentrators, LTE failover, and SNMP hooks for IT teams.
recommended: Hospitals or universities with existing network teams
Industrial control rooms requiring IT integration
kona_enterprise.image_alt: Tektelic KONA Enterprise gateway angled on a desk

kona_macro.name: Tektelic KONA Macro
kona_macro.summary: High gain outdoor gateway designed for miles of coverage, redundant radios, and high availability SLAs. Extremely rugged and built for extreme deployments.
recommended: Agricultural operations spanning thousands of acres
Municipal or utility deployments demanding SLA uptime
kona_macro.image_alt: Tektelic KONA Macro gateway installed outside

kerlink_istation.name: SenseCAP M2 LoRaWAN Gateway
kerlink_istation.summary: Cost-effective indoor gateway great for small installations and light duty environments.
kerlink_istation.image_alt: Kerlink Wirnet iStation gateway mounted on a rooftop

cta.headline: Work directly with our RF engineers
cta.body: Share square footage, building materials, and compliance requirements for each site. We'll map signal plans, stage gateways, and pre-configure monitoring inside CropWatch Command.

meta.title: CropWatch CW Air TH | Industrial Temperature & Humidity Sensor
meta.description: Deploy the CW Air TH sensor for reliable temperature and humidity monitoring across cold storage, hospitality, and industrial environments.

hero.title: Reliable monitoring you can trust
paragraphs: The CW Air TH sensor combines precision sensing, long-life power, and LoRaWAN connectivity to keep cold storage, hospitality, and industrial sites informed in real time.
Deploy the sensor as part of CropWatch Command for proactive alerts, compliance documentation, and predictable operations across every facility.

sidebar.title: Designed for demanding operators
sidebar.image_alt: CW Air TH sensor side view
bullets: Validated for HACCP, FDA, and ISO-compliant programs.
Ships pre-provisioned for CropWatch<sup><small>¬Æ</small></sup> gateways to eliminate manual setup.
Access predictive analytics and alerting through CropWatch<sup><small>¬Æ</small></sup> Command.

capabilities.headline: Reliable Cold-Chain Monitoring You Can Trust
paragraphs: Our cold-chain sensor stands apart through rigorous testing in some of the harshest real-world environments. Every design decision is driven by reliability ‚Äî from preventing sensor and device failures to ensuring data integrity under extreme conditions.

Unlike conventional devices, our system features an intelligent cross-validation mechanism that continuously verifies sensor accuracy and detects anomalies before they become problems. In other words, it answers the critical question: "What happens if a sensor stops reporting the correct value?"
At CropWatch, our goal is simple: deliver the most reliable and accurate cold-chain data in the industry ‚Äî so you can make confident decisions, backed by data you can trust.

diagram.headline: Cross-validated, Fail-Stop system for safe operation
body: The CW-Air-TH continuously cross-checks its replaceable sensor against each other to confirm every value before it reaches your dashboards. If the primary probe drifts or reports outside expected tolerances, the device flags the anomaly instantly and notifies you of an issue.
bullets: Dual-channel comparison cross-validates live telemetry against each other.
Automatic Fail-Stop prevents bad data from ever reaching your dashboards.
Exception events sync directly into compliance logs so auditors see proof of every validation step.
diagram.image_alt: Diagram showing CW Air TH cross-validating replaceable sensor readings

kit.headline: Everything you need to go live in days
kit.body_html: Every CW Air TH sensor arrives fully configured and ready to join CropWatch<sup><small>¬Æ</small></sup> Command, with mounting options and documentation tailored to regulated environments.

ui.headline: User Interface that is fast to use
ui.body: Our UI has been hyper optimized for quick data aquisition and easy navigation, so users can get to the information they need faster, reducing time spent on monitoring, and increasing time for other important tasks.

status_card.title: Status indicator states
status_card.helper: Click a pill or tap the badge on the demo card to see each network state.

temperature_card.title: Current temperature
temperature_card.helper: Click the thermometer on the demo card to step through recent samples.

humidity_card.title: Current humidity
humidity_card.helper: Tap the droplet to watch relative humidity arrive with every packet.

deployment.headline: Proven rollout workflow
deployment.body: Our hybrid deployment model keeps install timelines short while ensuring every stakeholder has the training, telemetry, and reporting they need to succeed.

closing.eyebrow: See CW Air TH in action
closing.headline: Schedule a walkthrough or start a pilot
closing.body: Connect with CropWatch<sup><small>¬Æ</small></sup> specialists to map out sensor placement, gateways, and analytics that keep your environments compliant and efficient.

rugged.title: Rugged industrial enclosure
rugged.body: IP67-rated shell with conformal coated electronics keeps the sensor operating in freezers, loading docks, and production floors.

precision.title: Precision monitoring
precision.body: High-accuracy digital sensing provides +/- 0.2¬∞C temperature and +/- 2% RH readings for compliance-ready reporting.

battery.title: Multi-year battery life
battery.body: Engineered for more than 10 years of continuous telemetry with field-replaceable lithium batteries and low-power firmware.

lorawan.title: LoRaWAN connectivity
lorawan.body: Secure LoRaWAN connectivity ensures resilient transmission through dense infrastructure and cold storage insulation.

sensor.label: Sensor
sensor.value: Sensirion x1 SHT40 & x1 SHT43, True NIST, w/ISO17025 Certification

heater.label: Integrated Heater
heater.value: Ensure condensation prevention in cold environments

protocol.label: Wireless protocol
protocol.value: LoRaWAN 1.0.4 Class A, regional bands supported

operating_life.label: Operating life
operating_life.value: Up to 5 years at 15 minute intervals

certifications.label: Certifications
certifications.value: FCC, CE, IC, HACCP compliant materials

items.sensor: CW Air TH sensor with pre-configured firmware
items.credentials: LoRaWAN activation credentials and QR deployment tag
items.mounting: Stainless steel mounting bracket with hardware and adhesive pads
items.playbook: Install and cold storage handling playbook

site_planning.title: Site planning
site_planning.body: CropWatch specialists map facility zones, determine gateway placement, and align telemetry intervals with compliance needs.

install.title: Rapid install
install.body: Technicians mount sensors using magnetic, adhesive, or bracket hardware options without disrupting production.

validation.title: Automated validation
validation.body: Sensors perform baseline calibration checks and register with CropWatch Command for continuous monitoring.

insight.title: Insight delivery
insight.body: Real-time dashboards, alerts, and audit-ready reports empower teams to resolve anomalies before they escalate.

online.label: Online
online.helper: Telemetry is current and within tolerance.

partial_error.label: Partial error
partial_error.helper: Some sensors need attention but data is flowing.

offline.label: Offline
offline.helper: No packets received within the expected interval.

details.title: Open or collapse sensor insights
details.body: Our UI allows you to organize and group devices by location. At the top left of the location card you can see the location health indicator. It shows green when devices are reporting normally, yellow for warnings, and red for critical issues. Use the chevron in the card to reveal detailed readings, alarms, and update history.

setup_location_device_names.title: Name your location and device
setup_location_device_names.body: Give each card a friendly label so teams instantly recognize which area or asset it represents.
setup_location_device_names.helper: Names entered here sync with the card header and device tag in the demo.

status.title: Glanceable location health
status.body: The badge in the top left cycles through Loading, Online, Partial Error, and Offline so operators can see device health instantly.

temperature.title: Live temperature monitoring
temperature.body: The left measurement updates as fast as packets arrive. Tap the thermometer in the demo card to sample live readings.

humidity.title: Humidity in lockstep
humidity.body: Relative humidity is captured alongside temperature to flag condensation risks. Click the droplet to see it update.

location_page.title: Brings you to a Location Detail page
location_page.body: The Location Details page shows every device within a location and allows you to update settings or permissions for who can access them.

device_detail.title: View the device detail page
device_detail.body: The Device Detail page provides in-depth telemetry, status history, and configuration options for a specific device, making troubleshooting straightforward.

meta.title: About CropWatch | Industrial IoT Built for Reliability
meta.description: Discover CropWatch's mission, leadership, and milestones as we deliver resilient IoT networks for cold storage, hospitality, and manufacturing.

hero.headline: Our Story - How we got to where we are today
paragraphs: We started off building devices that could survive the harshest agricultural environments. Over time, we realized that the same principles of reliability, accuracy, ease-of-use, and strong signal in touch locations were desperately needed in other industries where downtime is not an option.

Today, CropWatch is trusted by operations teams across cold storage, hospitality, manufacturing, and agriculture to deliver resilient IoT networks that keep facilities compliant and efficient. Our mission remains unchanged: to provide industrial-grade IoT solutions that empower operators with reliable data and insights, no matter the environment.

hubs.title: 6 global hubs
hubs.description: Sensor fleets monitored around the clock

sidebar.title: Built for demanding operators
sidebar.intro: Our teams blend RF engineering, industrial automation, and data science to deliver reliable insights where downtime is not an option.
points: Certified specialists in HACCP, OSHA, and ISO 9001 compliance workflows.
Hybrid deployment model blending on-site technicians with remote command centers.
Industry partnerships with leading sensor manufacturers and cloud platforms.

history.headline: From regional pilot to global coverage
history.intro: We have scaled alongside customers who need feet-on-the-ground expertise paired with modern telemetry. Each milestone sharpened our ability to deliver measurable value.

2016.title: First crop network deployed
2016.description: Partnered with a 40,000 acre citrus grower to prove LoRa-based microclimate monitoring at scale.

2018.title: Global sensor coverage
2018.description: Expanded gateway fleet across six countries with ruggedized hardware rated for harsh industrial environments.

2021.title: CropWatch analytics launch
2021.description: Delivered predictive dashboards and anomaly detection tuned for cold chain, hospitality, and manufacturing customers.

2024.title: Enterprise reliability standard
2024.description: Achieved 99.98% network uptime backed by 24/7 operations hubs and proactive firmware orchestration.

leadership.headline: Meet our highly skilled team
leadership.intro: In order to deliver reliable IoT solutions, we have assembled a team of experts with deep experience in Electronics, Software Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Product development from around the world.

evelyn.name: Evelyn Ortiz
evelyn.title: Chief Executive Officer
evelyn.bio: Former logistics executive who led connected supply chain programs for Fortune 100 grocers and retailers.

marcus.avatar_alt: Placeholder portrait illustration for Marcus Boyd

values.headline: Principles that keep customers at the center
values.intro: Every decision is measured against the uptime, compliance, and experience our customers expect. At the end of the day, we value each and every customer and aim to provide the best support possible. At CropWatch, each and everyone puts a little bit of themselves into the work that they have done, and because our work reflects us, we want our products to be the best that they can be.

operational_certainty.title: We actually value customer input
operational_certainty.description: Our product roadmap is driven by frontline feedback to ensure every feature delivers measurable operational clarity.

human_centered.title: Support is as important to us as it is to you
human_centered.description: We take requests from customers seriously and respond quickly to ensure your teams have the help they need, when they need it.

proof_of_value.title: Whenever we start a project, we make sure to fully understand your goals and objectives
proof_of_value.description: Every engagement begins with a clear business case and success metrics so outcomes are aligned from day one.

closing.headline: We are hiring engineers, operators, and customer champions
closing.body: If you are passionate about building reliable systems for industries where downtime is not an option, we would love to meet you.
